post.body: Thanks for the support! :) You know you'll get pulled into this somehow.
watch out for the snow. travel safe!
guessing you'll be waiting a long time before my tweets get political! I'll let that up to the others, like @jerobins I guess :)
where will the Brady talk video be available? Glad I was there this time!
RT: debcoates @bnr1: Tell him best of luck from me!
Enjoyed your reception... always fun to have an excuse for good food! Don't be a stranger!
Glad to find you on Twitter!
I nominate @stopstalkingme for a Shorty Award in #bestusername because it's uniquely creative!
Glad I was there. Appreciated learning more about SHC and especially that you had students with you! Thanks for the session!
BTW... thanks for the weather update on Thursday. Appreciated!
I'm in, and don't notice a change here. (and realize this tweet may have been more helpful 2+ hours ago :))
Happy Birthday! Hope it's a warm one for you!
yep... like I said... Works for me! :)
Pennsylvania Agriculture Secretary Dennis Wolff on the Short list for Obama administration's Secy of Agriculture http://tinyurl.com/5gryzk
Whew... another full day of learning. That's good, but makes for a tired brain. Looking forward to dinner with @kanter
Ready for Day 2 of Cognitive Edge training. So much to learn!
Wow - landed in Boston only 4.5 hrs late. Glad it was a flexible day. Sure hope things are more on schedule Thus. evening.
Boarding for possibly the last leg of today's trip. Making progress. Seeing more airports than expected. :)
Boarded again. Maybe this time LaGuardia will let us fly to them. Fingers crossed.
He he - just kidding. Now we are deplaned to wait an hour or so. Then what I said before. We'll see.
Just to change things up I'm boarded in Philly for LaGuardia on my way to Boston. An adventure!
Landed in Philly. Looks dry out - a good sign.
Boarded in State College. Early!
eXtension Institutional Teams meeting... so many things that you can do right now!
yep... lots of UPS action here in Ag Admin too. And now... silence of no heat or ventilation. hmmmm....
wondering if it would help people working in the eXtension collaborative tools to have all tools listed in the bar at the top of our apps
in eXtension Engineering Staff Meeting
busy weekend coming... last at-home conference Women's Volleyball matches, cousin's wedding Saturday, family to visit. Have a good one all!
back from the Volleyball luncheon, which by the say was at the Penn Stater, not the Inn, so had a good brisk walk across campus and back!
going to the Women's Volleyball Booster Luncheon at NLI. Yeah Team!
1st seed Penn State wins 1st and 2nd sets of NCAA Women's Volleyball first sound so far. Yay!
Having a fun day shopping with Mom and Cindy. Penn State Women's VB match tonight!
Landed State College. Home Sweet Home!
Boarded in Philly on my way home. It's raining but et least not snowing here!
Landed in Philly. So far so good.
Going through security at Boston airport. Hoping for an on time uneventful trip.
Day 3 of the Cognitive Edge training. This is very cool. Hoping I learn enough to know what to do next!
and now to the "What's on Your Mind" series session at the HUB featuring @targuman / @shcdean !
it's been a big day! Holiday party at lunch, PD session on Fierce and Crucial Conversations thanks to @aafromaa, and now to ...
Finished with Jazzercize for the evening and got the 'study' package mailed to our Philly girl!
heading out to Jazzercise!
Going to the send off reception for Tom Weber. We're sure gonna miss him in Ag, and hoping SHC appreciates him lots!! :)
Getting new drawers installed in the kitchen pantry to replace shelves. Almost like an early Christmas present to us!
in staff meeting with colleagues afar
Dinner time. Soup at Panera.
Glad to hear the Penn State Momen's Volleyball team won again tonight. Just need to win 3 more matches!
Lunch with My Girl at Subway
Still shopping with My Girl. Getting hungry. . . Wondering when she'll take a break for lunch :-)
Reading a paperback while My Girl tries on clothes at Gap Outlet.
Shopping with My Girl in Lancaster! So happy that roads were clear and dry!
Wondering what's gonna happen to the shopping day with My Girl tomorrow. Maybe there will be no ice/no snow. One can always hope.
Headed out into the wet before it freezes!
In the eXtension Second Life Roundtable. Seeing a demo of Teen SL by Bunny Easterwood
re: http://shortyawards.com Please tweet: @shortyawards I nominate @stopstalkingme for a Shorty Award in #bestusername because (any reason!)
on the all eXtension staff call
on the monthly ACE SIG Leaders conference call
on to the next conference call... with @thomas69osu
Ask an Expert task force meeting/call
Going to meet my girls at Cozy Thai for lunch :)
Just finished gas and lunch stop in Brookville. Heading west.
Traveling west on 322 trough Phillipsburg.
Watching The Kids play Wii bowling after Old Bay chicken for dinner. @ckraney was the chef. :-)
I'm home, opening Christmas cards came waiting to have dinner with the Kids
Heading out for one of those not-so-fun medical appts, then lunch with My Boy, then back to do the January PD announcement.
in a Debriefing meeting for PA's 2008 Extension Annual Conference.
Penn State wins 2008 Women's Volleyball National Championship 3-0 over Stanford! Yay!
Headed home... then to Jazzercise... then to wrapping presents :)
in the eXtension Review Panel presentation.
Enjoying yummy holiday breakfast with the Ag IT unit. They decided the men should always cook. Works for me!
Woo Hoo! Penn State wins NCAA Women's Volleyball semi-finals !
Double oh oh VB semi-finals thee at 2 sets each.
Oh oh . . . Nebraska takes set 3. Penn State leads 2 sets to 1
YES! Penn State wins 2nd set 25 - 18
Penn State wins first set 25 - 17 over Nebraska in Women's Volleyball NCAA semi-finals
Penn State Women's Volleyball in NCAA semi-finals now. On ESPN2
Time to Jazzercise... trying to get ready for more Christmas treats this week :)
